name: Gigamart POS Streaming
description: Real-time streaming ingestion of POS transactions from Pub/Sub to BigQuery

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table for raw POS transactions (e.g. <project>:giga_raw.raw_pos_transactions). If not set, defaults are taken from config.

parameters.name: window_size
parameters.label: Window Size (seconds)
parameters.helpText: Fixed window size in seconds for processing (default in code: 60).

parameters.name: allowed_lateness
parameters.label: Allowed Lateness (seconds)
parameters.helpText: Allowed lateness for late arriving data in seconds (default in code: 3600).
